g.text: TransCredit Insurance Certificate Processing Business Process Flow
Receive Monthly Sales Report from Bank/Agent
even if incorrect - track agent submissions
Make manual adjustments based on regulations
Email agent to verify policy status
submitted by agent first - even if wrong
This shows what agent actually wanted
- System calculations may differ but use agent amounts
All corrections logged with timestamps and users
- Always input certificate exactly as printed
- All changes must comply with state regulations
- 95% of time spent on corrections vs. data entry
